articles.content: London: A purple bacteria -- which store energy from light -- can help harvest hydrogen fuel from sewage, and recover carbon from any type of organic waste, scientists have found. Organic compounds i… [+2688 chars]

articles.author: ET EnergyWorld
articles.title: Wind farm 'predator' effect hits ecosystems: study by Indian Institute of Science - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: An international team of scientists studied the effects of wind turbine use in the Western Ghats, a UNESCO-listed range of mountains and forest spanning India's west coast region and a global "hotspot" of biodiversity.
articles.content: Paris: Wind farms act as a top "predator" in some ecosystems, harming birds at the top of the food chain and triggering a knock-on effect overlooked by green energy advocates, scientists said Monday.… [+3215 chars]
